name: Grey Goose Mediterranean Mary

ingredients.item: Grey Goose Vodka (Original or Le Citron)

preparation:
Rub the lemon wedge on the outer edge of a tall glass and then roll the glass lip in the salt.
Add the remaining ingredients to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice.
Shake vigorously and strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a cucumber spear and an olive.
